main_definition: Relatively simple or not requiring much effort, skill, or time to accomplish.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not difficult; without much trouble or resistance.
meanings_and_examples.example: The test was easy because I studied the material thoroughly.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Of a task, requiring little effort or skill to complete.
meanings_and_examples.example: Cleaning my room is an easy chore for me.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Highly favourable; advantageous or beneficial in some way.
meanings_and_examples.example: Getting a discount on this item makes it really easy to afford.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having the ability to do something with ease and without much strain.
meanings_and_examples.example: She is very graceful, making even complex dance moves look easy for her.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Fairly simple or not challenging; lacking in difficulty.
meanings_and_examples.example: The recipe was so straightforward that it was extremely easy to follow.
